title.narrative: 3.1 EVIDENCE BASED PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: 3.1 Government has improved institutional capacity for evidence-based policy planning, and monitoring., which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023, more children have improved and meaningful learning outcomes

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.1 Government has improved institutional capacity for evidence-based policy planning, and monitoring.
